resources.string: Pokreni događaj i ako je već ručno pokrenut profil
Nije u blizini ( u dometu skeniranja)
Nije u blizini ( u dometu skeniranja)
pauziraj događaj - aktiviraj i vrati profil
Prikaži u status baru i zaključanom ekranu
pauziraj događaj - aktiviraj i restartuj događaje
Razdvoj zvuk zvona od zvuka obaveštenja
Kliknite ovde da vidite bitne informacije
Neki profili zahtevaju root pristup. Ova podešavanja su označena sa \"(R)\".
Startuj samo kada je sledeći profil aktiviran
Možete koristiti zamenske znakove \"%\"=vešestruki karakteri, \"_\"=jedan karakter.
Neki profili zahtevaju promene sistemskih podešavanja. Ova podešavanja su označena sa \"(S)\".
Da omogućite \"tip prekida\" parametre profila, omogućite PhoneProfilesPlus \"Pristup obaveštenjima\" u sistemskim podešavanjima.
\"Prekidi\" u profilu \"Mod zvona\"zahtevaju da omogućite PhoneProfilesPlus u \"Pristup obaveštenjima\" sistemskim podešavanjima. Kliknite ovde i omogućite PhoneProfilesPlus.
Da omogućite senzor obaveštenja omogućite PhoneProfilesPlus \"Pristup obaveštenjima\" u sistemskim podešavanjima.
Omogućite ih u sledećem dijalogu. Profil će onda biti aktiviran.
potrebne su neke dozvole da se omoguće.
Omogućite ih u sledećem dijalogu. Onda možete izabrati pozadinu u galeriji.
Biranjem proizvoljnog profila ikone zahteva određene dozvole.
Omogućite ih u sledećem dijalogu. Onda možete izabrati ikonu u galeriji.
Rezervna kopija podešavanja aplikacije zahteva određene dozvole.
Omogućite ih u sledećem dijalogu. Podešavanja će onda biti snimljena kao kopija.
Vraćanje podešavanja aplikacije zahteva određene dozvole.
Omogućite ih u sledećem dijalogu. Podaci će onda biti vraćeni.
Niste omogućili \"Prilagodi sistemska podešavanja\". Nikada ne pitaj ponovo?
Omogućite ih u sledećem dijalogu. Događaji će onda biti restartovani.
potrebne su neke dozvole da se omoguće.
Omogućite dozvole u sledećem dijalogu. Ponovno skeniranje će biti obavljeno.
Uzimanje liste iz kalendara zahteva određene dozvole.
Omogućite ih u sledećem dijalogu. Kalendar će onda biti restartovan.
Uzimanje liste kontakata zahteva određene dozvole.
Omogućite ih u sledećem dijalogu. Lista kontakata će onda biti prikazana.
Wi-Fi skeniranje u modu uštede energije
Bluetooth skeniranje u modu uštede energije
U Android 6 verziji nije moguće promeniti podešavanje za \" Vibriraj kada zvoni\" na uređajima koji nemaju root pristup.
U Android 6+ verziji nije moguće promeniti podešavanje za \" Prilagodljiva osvetljenost\" na uređajima koji nemaju root pristup.
U Android 6+ verziji da bi radilo Wi-Fi skeniranje morate omogućiti Lokaciju i Wi-Fi skeniranje u podešavanjima za Lokaciju.
U Android 6+ verziji da bi radilo Bluetooth LE skeniranje morate omogućiti Lokaciju i Bluetooth LE skeniranje u podešavanjima za Lokaciju.
Bluetooth LE trajanje skeniranja ( u sekundama)
Potreban je root pristup za promenu nivoa prilagođavanja.
Profil može biti aktiviran u jedan ili dva moda:
Ručna aktivacija - Aktivirana u Aktivatoru; Editor, obaveštenje, vidžet, prečice. Ručno aktivirani profili su označeni sa \"[M]\" na početku imena profila.
Ručna aktivacija pauzira sve događaje, koji nikada neće startovati. Morate ručno restartovati događaje za nastavak normalnog funkcionisanja.
Izuzetak od ovog pravila primjenjuje se kada postavite podešavanja \"Zanemari ručno aktiviranje\".
Pozivanje restarta događaja se može obaviti preko Aktivatora, Editora ili obaveštenja.
U imenima Aktivatora i Editora se nalazi \"semafor\".
Narandžasto: događaji se ne mogu startovati - profil je aktiviran ručno.
Crveno: događaji su zaustavljeni - startovanje događaja se može omogućiti preko menija u Editoru \"Omogući pokretanje događaja\".

Android 6+ je implementirao „Doziran mod“ i „Aplikacija u čekanju“. Što se tiče problema s aktiviranjem profila događaja, ako uređaj neko vreme ostavite bez napajanja sa isključenim ekranom, kliknite ovdje da dodate PhoneProfilesPlus u \"Ne optimizirano\".
Događaj može da ima jedno od 6 stanja:
Pokrenuto: Događaj je u toku. Parametri događaja su ispunjeni.
Pauzirano: događaj ne radi. Parametri događaja nisu ispunjeni. Događaj čeka na parametre da se ispune.
Stopped: event is stopped and cannot be started. Event parameter \"Enable run\" is not checked.
Paused with delay: event is started, but is waiting for the delay to expire. Event parameters are satisfied.
When no events are running, the \"Default profile\" is enabled if configured. You can configure a default profile in application settings in \"Profile activation\". Click here to configure it.
Kako Razdvajanje zvuka zvona od zvuka obaveštenja funkcioniše:

Aktiviranje profila podešava jačinu uređaja prema nivou jačine obaveštenja u profilu. Kada se melodija zvona prepozna, podešava se glasnoća zvona iz trenutnog profila. Kad je poziv završen, vraća se glasnoća obaveštenja iz aktivnog profila.
Ne mogu obrisati, trenutna lokacija se koristi u drugom događaju.
Please grant them in next dialog. Location change detection will then be performed.
Povezivanje sa Google Play servisom nije uspelo. Kliknite ovde za pokušaj ispravke.
Podešavanje parametara lokacije u podešavanjima aplikacije.
Skeniranje lokacije u modu uštede energije
Omogućite Lokaciju u sistemskim podešavanjima. Bez ovoga skeniranje lokacije nije moguće.
Koristi GPS kada nisi u Modu uštede energije
Pokretanje sa kašnjenjem: događaj je pokrenut ali parametri nisu ispunjeni. Događaj čeka kašnjenje da istekne.
Eksperimentalno. Možda neće raditi na vašem uređaju.
Podešavanje Wi-Fi parametara skeniranja u podešavanjima aplikacije.
Podešavanje Bluetooth parametara skeniranja u podešavanjima aplikacije.
Skeniranje orijentacije u modu uštede energije
Podešavanje parametara skeniranja orijentacije u podešavanjima aplikacije.

Ako opcija \"24 sata\" ne radi na vašem uređaju (LG), koristite opciju \"Uvek uključeno\". Opcija \"Uvek uključena\" može izazvati probleme na Samsung uređajima. Ako postoji problem, koristite opciju \"24 sata\".
Odabrali ste zvuk zvona / notifikacije sa SD kartice. Ovaj zvuk se ne može koristiti jer zahteva određene dozvole.
Please grant them in next dialog. Tone will then be played.
Playing selected ringer/notification requires some permissions to be granted.
Some profile preferences are interactive. These preferences display system setup screens, and are marked with \"(I)\".
Note: Orange text in this information is clickable. Clicking on this text opens the relevant setup screen.
Pokretanje događaja nije omogućeno. Omogućiti sad?
Ocenite ovu aplikaciju na Google Play-u
Niste omogućili \"Ne uznemiravaj pristup\". Nikada ne pitaj ponovo?
Dodajte „PhoneProfilesPlus“ u „Not Optimized“. Ako imate problema s aktiviranjem profila događaja ili ostavite uređaj neko vrijeme bez napajanja sa isključenim ekranom.
Počmi kada je izvan mobilne ćelije
Skeniranje mobilne ćelije zahteva neke dozvole.
Podešavanje parametara skeniranja mobilne ćelije u podešavanjima aplikacije.
Skeniranje mobilne ćelije u modu uštede energije
Svi Bluetooth nazivi konfigurisani u sistemu
Svaki događaj ima \"prioritet\". Događaj neće započeti ako događaj koji već radi ima viši prioritet.
Events run in \"Start order\". You can modify the start order in Editor in events view \"Start order\". You simply drag events up/down by the \"order handler\".
You can activate a profile through Tasker. Configure task \"System\"/\"Send Intent\" with parameters:
Obriši stare dnevnike aktivnosti ( u danima)
You can manage events through Tasker. Configure task \"System\"/\"Send Intent\" with parameters:
Morate upisati ime taga u sam NFC tag.\"Upiši u NFC tag\" se nalazi u meniju za svako ime taga.
Priključite uređaj na NFC tag. Upis će započeti.
NFC mora da je omogućen. Omogućite ga i pokušajte ponovo.
Mislite li daje ova aplikacija korisna?\nPodržite njen razvoj doniranjem.
Niste omogućili \"Piši preko aplikacija\". Nikada ne pitaj ponovo?
Ove važne informacije mogu se pregledati u uređivaču kroz ikonu upitnika na alatnoj traci.
ne podržani tip mreže ili ne može da se promeni

Događaj će započeti samo ako su ispunjeni svi parametri \"Omogući senzor\". Pokrenuti događaj završit će ako neki od označenih parametara senzora nisu ispunjeni. Označite samo senzore koji su vam potrebni za ovaj događaj. Naziv označenog senzora obeležen je podebljanim tekstom. \ N \ nNeki parametri senzora su potrebni. Naglašena su imena potrebnih senzora. Ako bilo koji potrebni parametar senzora nije konfigurisan, događaj se neće pokrenuti i parametar \"Omogući senzor\" neće biće označen.
Neki uređaji ne podržavaju ikone u punoj boji u status baru.
Vaš uređaj ima povezane nivoe jačine zvuka zvona i obaveštenja. Možete koristiti \"Razdvoji tonove zvona i glasnoće obaveštenja\". Kliknite ovdje da biste ga konfigurisali.
Vaš uređaj ima povezane glasnoće zvuka zvona i obaveštenja. Ako želite razdvajanje zvukova zvona i obaveštenja omogućite ovaj parametar.
Omogući korištenje parametra \"Prioritet\" u podešavanjima aplikacije.
If ringtone volume is set to \"0\", it configures the device for silent mode. Notification volume is ignored.
Priority functionality: Event will not start if another running event has a higher priority level.
Ovaj senzor će pokrenuti događaj pomoću vremena. Parametri: Početno vreme, Vreme završetka; Dani u nedelji.
This sensor will start an event by calendar event. Parameters: Calendars, Search field (Event name, Description, etc.), Search string, Ignore \"All day\" events, Availability (Busy, Free, etc.).
This sensor will start an event by battery level. Parameters: Low level, Upper level, Charging, Power save mode.
This sensor will start an event by calling contacts. Parameters: Call event (Ringing, Outgoing call started, etc.), Contact groups, Contacts, Contact list type (white/black list).
This sensor will start an event by received SMS/MMS from contacts. Parameters: Contact groups, Contacts, Contact list type (white/black list), Permanent run, Duration (event run duration).
This sensor will start an event by device location. Parameters: Location, Start when outside location.
This sensor will start an event by Wi-Fi SSID. Parameters: Connection Type (Nearby, Connected, etc.), SSID.
This sensor will start an event by Bluetooth name. Parameters: Connection Type (Nearby, Connected, etc.), Scanned device type (Classic, Low energy, etc.), Bluetooth name.
This sensor will start an event by connected mobile cells (towers). Parameters: Cells, Start when outside cells.
This sensor will start an event by connected accessory (car dock, hands-free, headphones, etc.). Parameters: Accessories type.
This sensor will start an event by screen on/off. Parameters: Event type (screen on, screen off, etc.), End when unlocked (event ends when device unlocked).
This sensor will start an event by notification from applications. Parameters: Applications, End when dismissed (end of event at notification dismissal), Permanent run, Duration (event run duration).
This sensor will start an event by application in foreground. Parameters: Applications.

This sensor will start an event by device orientation. Parameters: Display (Up, down), Sides (Horizontal, side up), Distance (Near, far; used is proximity sensor), Ignore for applications (in foreground).
This sensor will start an event by NFC tags. Parameters: NFC tags, Permanent run, Duration (event run duration).
Click this to open Application menu, where you can change application Settings.
Click this to restart events. You must restart events if you have a manually activated profile.
Click this to open activity log. Items logged are activities about start/pause/stop events, profile activations, applications started, etc.
Klikni ovde za dodavanje novoga profila.
Klikni ovde za brisanje svih profila.
Kliknite ovde za prikaz bitnih informacija. Molimo da pročitate.
Klikni ovde za dodavanje novoga događaja.
Klikni ovde za brisanje svih događaja.
Klikni ovde za otvaranje podešavanja profila.
Klikni ovde za otvaranje menija profila sa opcijama: Aktiviraj, Dupliraj i Obriši profil.
Drag profile up/down with this handler to change the profile view order in Activator.
Klikni ovde za otvaranje podešavanja profila.
Click this to open event menu with options: Enable/Stop run, Duplicate and Delete event.
Drag event up/down with this handler to change the event \"Start order\".
Click this to open Editor, where you can configure profiles, events, change application settings, etc.
Click this to open Editor, where you can configure profiles, change application settings, etc.
Klikni ovde da sačuvaš promene podešavanja profila.
Klikni ovde da sačuvaš promene podešavanja događaja.
Ovaj profil se aktivira kada nema drugih pokrenutih događaja.
(R) Koristi root pristup ( uređaj mora da bude rutovan)
Ovaj senzor će pokreniti događaj sa prebacivanjem radija ( Uklj./Isklj.). Parametri: Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Mobilni podaci, GPS, NFC, Mod u avionu.
Svi opcije za radio moraju biti ispunjene za početak događaja. Konfigurišite samo one opcije za radio koje su vam potrebne.
Koristi ovo ako detekcija veze glasnoće je pogrešna.
\"Ne uznemiravaj\" u profilu \"Mod zvona\"zahtevaju da omogućite PhoneProfilesPlus u \"Pristup obaveštenjima\" sistemskim podešavanjima. Kliknite ovde i omogućite ih.
In Android 6: This system setting can be changed only on rooted devices. Affected are ringer modes and do not disturb types with vibration.
Parametar ime_profila nedostaje ili je prazan.
Parametar Ime_događaja nedostaje ili je prazan.
Panel za Samsung telefon sa rubom
Neka podešavanja profila zahtevaju dozvolu: PODEŠAVANJE_SIGURNOG_ZAPISA: Root pristup nije neophodan. Ova podešavanja su označena sa \"(G1)\".
Za više informacija, pogledati u sekciju \"Profili\" dole u nastavku.
Profile parameters marked with (G1) need special permission for PhoneProfilesPlus. This is done through your PC with installed adb.
Ako nemate ADB instaliran na vašem PC-u:
Na vašem uređaju, idite u Podešavanja / O / Informacije o softveru i kliknite sedam puta na opciju Build. Ovim će te otključati i prikazati Meni za programere u podešavanjima.
Idite u Podešavanja u Mod programera i omogućite opciju \"USB debagovanje\".
On your PC, open a Command Prompt (Windows), or Terminal (Linux, OSX). Navigate to the folder where you extracted your adb files, and EXACTLY execute the following command:
Posle uspešnog izvršenja, svi parametri profila označeni sa (G1) biće omogućeni.

PROFILES: Allow you to configure device settings such as ringer mode, volume levels, ringtone and notification sounds, radio switch (Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, mobile data, etc.). When a profile is activated, the corresponding settings are permanent. If you want settings to change, another profile must be activated.
Profili se mogu startovati ručno, ili od strane događaja.

You can manually activate a profile through the PPP Activator (pop-up window with list of available profiles). The Activator can be displayed via the PPP home icon, the PPP notification, PPP widgets and, for Samsung Edge devices, from the Edge panel. You can also directly activate a profile through the PPP 4x4 widget, a shortcut to the profile or, on Samsung Edge devices, through the Edge panel.
EVENTS: Allow you to configure when a profile activates. Events have a start and end. You can configure what will happen at the start of an event, and what will happen when the event ends.
Događaji sadrže važna podešavanja parametara senzora, koja sva moraju da su podešena prije nego se može pokreniti događaj. Ako bilo koji senzor ne prođe događaj se završava ( pauzira).
Time sensor: Start and End on a specified day of the week, or at a specified time.

Wi-Fi sensor: Start and End by Wi-Fi SSID (connected, device nearby). The Nearby feature is useful to detect device location. For example: Start event when the device is within scanning range of your home Wi-Fi network.
Bluetooth sensor: Similar to Wi-Fi sensor. Useful for car Bluetooth.
Location sensor: Start and End by device location (GPS). You must enable Location Services in device system settings.
Mobile cell sensor: Start and End by connection to or disconnection from mobile cell towers.
Call sensor: Start and End via configured contacts. For example, when ringing.
Accessories sensor: Start an event when, for example, headphones are connected.
NFC sensor: Start an event via NFC tags.

If you manually activate a profile (not by an event), all running events are ended (paused). Events will not start during manual profile activation. However, you can override this behavior via the \"Ignore manual activation\" setting in event parameters.

Profiles and Events are configured in the Editor, which you can invoke through the Activator. Within the Editor you can add, duplicate, update, and delete profiles and events. The Editor has a left side panel, which allows you to change the Editor view. Use it to switch between profile and event lists.
Do not pause during manual activation
Do not pause this running event if a profile is manually activated
Skeniraj samo kada je ekran uključen
nije omogućeno podešavanje Dostupnostii za PhoneProfilesPlusExtender
Za omogućavanje parametra \"Aplikacije\" dozvolite \"Pristupačnost\" u sistemskim podešavanjima PhoneProfilesPlusExtender-a.
Za omogućavanje parametra \"Ignoriši Aplikacije\" dozvolite \"Pristupačnost\" u sistemskim podešavanjima PhoneProfilesPlusExtender-a.
Za omogućavanje parametra \"Aplikacije\" klikni ovde za instalaciju PhoneProfilesPlusExtender-a.
Za omogućavanje parametra \"Ignoriši Aplikacije\" klikni ovde za instalaciju PhoneProfilesPlusExtender-a.
Klikni ovde za proveru promena i nadogradnju PhoneProfilesPlusExtender-a.

Zbog promene Googleovih pravila o korištenju usluga pristupačnosti morate instalirati PhoneProfilesPlusExtender da biste koristili senzor događaja aplikacije i senzor orijentacijskog događaja. Proverite parametre ovih senzora za više informacija.
Možete konfigurisati više zameniskih znakova. Razdvojite ih sa znakom \"|\".
Ovaj profil je aktivan kada nema pokrenutog događaja. Klikni ovde za podešavanja.
Siguronosna kopija baze je u novoj verziji.
Ovo obaveštenje koristi medijski kanal. Što znači da koristi glasnoću medija.
Please enable Location and Wi-Fi scanning in System Settings. Without this, Wi-fi scanning will not work.
Please enable Location and Bluetooth scanning in System Settings. Without this, Bluetooth scanning will not work.
Please configure \"Keep Wi-Fi on during sleep\" to \"Always\". Without this, Wi-Fi scanning will not work during device sleep.
Please do not configure interval to value less than
minutes. This greatly increases the battery consumption.
seconds. This greatly increases the battery consumption.
Skeniraj i kada je Wi-Fi onemogućen
Skeniraj i kada je Bluetooth onemogućen
Preuzmite poslednju verziju PhoneProfilesPlusExtender.apk sa GitHub sajta. Zatim kliknite na obaveštenje o preuzetoj aplikaciji za instalaciju.
Hvala na donaciji,\n jako to cenimo.
Donacije putem aplikacije nisu podržane. Da li je Google Play Store instalirana pravilno?
Moguće da neće raditi Hotspot sa drugim uređajima.
Prikaži aktiviran profil sa započetim događajem.
Prikaži vreme čekanja prijave na mobilnu ćeliju.
Shows permission witch is needed grant it.
Shows notification about start of event.
Please install the new version of PhoneProfilesPlusExtender. More information about installation is in parameters for which is PhoneProfilesPlusExtender required.
Click here to display PhoneProfilesPlusExtender releases in GitHub.
To enable \"Force stop applications\" parameter, click here to install PhoneProfilesPlusExtender.
New version of PhoneProfilesPlusExtender is required. Click here to upgrade it.
To enable \"Force stop applications\" parameter, allow PhoneProfilesPlusExtender \"Accessibility\" in system settings.
It works only when the screen is on and unlocked.
If you have problems, questions and suggestions, write me an email:
Simulates press of Home button in navigation bar.
These settings are for Location event sensor.
These settings are for Wi-Fi event sensor.
These settings are for Bluetooth event sensor.
These settings are for event Mobile cell event sensor.
These settings are for Orientation event sensor.
Custom icon image is too large. Allowed is max.
Backup files will be saved in device internal storage into folder
Note: Backup files contains sensitive private data. Distribute files to third parties, for example in zip file with password.
Privacy policy is changed. Especially about backup files generated by Backup function.
Click this to show Privacy policy.
Change of adaptive level may not work on your device (example: Samsung devices).
Mobile cell registration requires some permissions.
(C) configured in system, (S) returned by scanner.
(C) configured in system, (S) returned by scanner.
Error restoring the shared profile preferences.
Some event preferences require changes in system Settings. These preferences are marked with \"(S)\".
Some permissions are not granted. Click here to grant it.
Paused: some profile is manually activated and event has not enabled parameter \"Ignore manual activation\".

Profile and event duration, time sensor, calendar sensor, events delay start and end are not exact, when screen is off. Enable this parameter, to set it exact. Alarm clock icon will be displayed in status bar.

Profile and event duration, time sensor, calendar sensor, events delay start and end are not exact, when screen is off. Enable in Settings parameter \"System\"→\"Use alarm clock\", to set it exact. Alarm clock icon will be displayed in status bar.
Some underlined parameters are not configured!
You have not enabled \"Display pop-up window\". Never ask again?
This sensor will start an event by alarm clock. Parameters: Permanent run, Duration (event run duration).
Please grant root for PhoneProfilesPlus. Is required for profile and event parameters, which requires root.
Please grant root for PhoneProfiles. Is required for profile parameters, which requires root.
Please open root manager installed in your device and grant root for PhoneProfilesPlus.
Grant root is not enabled. Click here to grant it.
for change ringtone, notification, alarm sound
for enable/disable mobile data, change mobile network type, connect to SSID
for unlink ringing and notification volumes, enable/disable speakerphone during call
for save backup data into storage
for load backup data from storage
for read calendar data in Calendar sensor
for detect phone calls in Orientation sensor (for ignore orientation change during call)
for use location data in Location sensor
for use location data in Wi-Fi sensor
for use location data in Bluetooth sensor
for use location data in Mobile cells sensor
for play ringing and notification sounds
for change sound profile, change ringing, notification, system volume
for enable/disable DTMF tone when dialing
for load custom icons from storage
for read location data during configuration
for read calendar data during configuration
Your device does not have linked volumes for ringtone and notifications.
Activate it only when at end of event is not activated any profile and for restart events.
Allow PhoneProfilesPlusExtender \"Accessibility\" in system settings. Accessibility function is not used, running service is needed for receiving SMS and MMS.
Click here to install PhoneProfilesPlusExtender. Running service is needed for receiving SMS and MMS.

Due to a change of rules by Google, about usage of permissions for receive SMS and MMS, you must install PhoneProfilesPlusExtender to use the SMS/MMS event sensor. Check the parameters of this sensor for more information.
Please help me with translation, thank you:
Displays active profile with preferences indicator. Opens Activator on touch.
Use icon lightness for custom profile icons
Pause event after manual profile activation and the restart events
Allow PhoneProfilesPlusExtender \"Accessibility\" in system settings. Accessibility function is not used, running service is needed for receiving calls.
Click here to install PhoneProfilesPlusExtender. Running service is needed for receiving calls.
for read contacts in SMS/MMS sensor
for read contacts, detect ringing call (for \"night call\") in Call sensor

Due to a change of rules by Google, about usage of permissions for receive calls, you must install PhoneProfilesPlusExtender to use the Call event sensor. Check the parameters of this sensor for more information.
Please grant permission Phone in PhoneProfilesPlusExtender. Is required for receiving calls by Extender.
Please grant permission SMS in PhoneProfilesPlusExtender. Is required for receiving SMS/MMS by Extender.
PhoneProfilesPlusExtender is not in newest version!
Please enable Location in System Settings. Without this, Mobile cells scanning will not work.
Clear this notification to stop displaying it.
Use \"!\" at the beginning of the string when the string should not be present.
\"!\" at the beginning of the string
Applications, shortcuts, intents to run it
For lock type \"Use PhoneProfilesPlusExtender\", click here to install PhoneProfilesPlusExtender.
For lock type \"Use PhoneProfilesPlusExtender\", allow PhoneProfilesPlusExtender \"Accessibility\" in system settings.
In Android 9+, for Mobile cells scanning to work, you must enable Location in system settings.
You disable global events run (red \"traffic light\") - enable it in Editor menu with item \"Enable events run\".

You manually activated a profile (orange \"traffic light\") - you must restart events. Use Restart events icon in title of Activator, Editor or in notification. Manually activated profiles are indicated with \"[M]\" in front of the profile name. Exception applies when the event has \"Ignore manual activation\" preference checked.
You disable Run event in event preferences - event preferences \"Enable run\" must by checked. Note: \"Traffic light\" is in title of Activator and Editor.
If Mobile cells scanning not working, enable Location in System Settings.

for switch Bluetooth ON/OFF in Bluetooth sensor

for use location data to get sunrise/sunset time in Time sensor

Allow PhoneProfilesPlusExtender for:\n• profile parameter \"Force stop applications\"\n• event parameters \"Application sensor\", \"Orientation sensor\", \"SMS/MMS sensor\", \"Call sensor\".
• Accessibility service for profile parameter \"Force stop applications\":
• Accessibility service for event parameters \"Application sensor\" and \"Orientation sensor\":
• Accessibility service for event parameter \"SMS/MMS sensor\". Accessibility function is not used, service is needed for receiving SMS and MMS.:
• Permissions for event parameter \"SMS/MMS sensor\" - permission SMS:
• Accessibility service for event parameter \"Call sensor\". Accessibility function is not used, service is needed for receiving calls.:
• Permissions for event parameter \"Call sensor\" - permission Phone:
• Permissions for event parameter \"Call sensor\" - permission Phone, Call logs:
• Accessibility service for profile parameter \"Lock device\":
